name: Splinter Matron
description: The Splinter Matron is a medium-sized fey creature known for its mischievous and malevolent nature, characterized by its chaotic appearance and an imposing dexterity.
memorable: It can unleash a powerful area effect called Splinter Spray, which can incapacitate multiple opponents and create openings for its allies.
goals: To protect its tree and disrupt intruders with chaotic magic and physical attacks.
relations: Could be encountered alongside other fey creatures, given its ability to communicate in Elvish and Sylvan.
environment: Typically found in magical or forested areas, particularly where its tree is located.
strengths: Resistant to non-magical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage; has Magic Resistance which grants advantage on saving throws against spells.
weaknesses: Low Wisdom score makes it vulnerable to effects relying on Wisdom saving throws.
attacks: Utilizes multiattacks with claws that inflict slashing and poison damage, alongside ranged splinter attacks.
most_powerful_ability: Splinter Spray can deal significant area damage and blind multiple targets.
skills: Possesses poor perception skills with a score of -1, indicating a lack of awareness of threats.
additional_information: Magic Resistance provides an edge against magical assault.
Protective Frenzy enhances its offensive capabilities when its tree is damaged.
Can inflict ongoing damage with splinters after a successful initial attack.
Highly agile with a Dexterity score of 18, allowing it to avoid attacks.
Maintains strong durability due to high Constitution score of 19.
